description:
Quit trying to create charts and flowcharts in programs that weren’t designed specifically for diagramming. Instead, let ClipTraining take you through this comprehensive training series and learn how to take advantage of Microsoft’s professional diagramming application.

With 30 videos and over 1.5 hours of training material, the instructor will take viewers through a step-by-step instructional teaching you everything from the basics of Visio to working with shapes, text, formatting and much more. We understand that you don’t have time to waste on unneeded content, which is why we teach with the idea of ‘concentrated content.’ Meaning, we teach you exactly what you need to know in the minimal time it takes to learn it. This is why ClipTraining is relied upon by the Fortune 100 and K-12 schools everywhere.

Once you have completed this Microsoft Visio 2010 training you will have full capability of creating professional diagrams which can help to simplify complex information.  This course makes learning to diagram easy; whether you want to build a chart or flowchart, create a map or design a floor plan. This is the best course for the job!
title: Learn Microsoft Visio 2010
